channel.title: Webpack on Khoa Pham
channel.description: Recent content in Webpack on Khoa Pham

item.title: Webpack Starter - Use ES6 Today
item.description: Back in early 2015, when I started writing Javascript in ES6; it was not easy to get everything running smoothly at that time. Today some developers are still not sure where to get started using ES6 even though it’s widely adopted by Javascript community. I spent an evening writing a simple Webpack Boilerplate to help new developers to use it for their new projects. What does this minimalist boilerplate include?
